name: aras-llantas-monorepo
description: Ara's Llantas Tire Shop - Full Stack Application

scripts.start: concurrently "cd node-backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd node-backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.lint: cd node-backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd node-backend && npm run lint:fix && cd ../frontend && npm run lint:fix
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd node-backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run test

author: Ara's Llantas
